decks.notes: The deck focuses on using a variety of removal spells and control elements to disrupt the opponent's game plan while generating value through recursion and powerful threats like Omnath and Titania. The deck also aims to ramp up quickly with cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Wrenn and Six, allowing it to quickly establish board presence and take control of the game. Additionally, the deck includes a diverse mana base to support its four-color control strategy and ensure that it can cast its spells effectively.

The deck focuses on utilizing the combo potential of Underworld Breach with cards like Grinding Station and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to create a loop that allows for infinite mana and card advantage. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps to find key combo pieces while Mishra's Bauble and Mox Opal provide additional card draw and ramp. The deck also includes efficient removal spells like Unholy Heat and Malevolent Rumble to control the board. Urza's Saga acts as a versatile toolbox land, providing access to key artifacts. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and win the game in a single explosive turn.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful toolbox of creatures that can be searched for and put into play using cards like Chord of Calling and Green Sun's Zenith. The goal is to generate value and disrupt the opponent's game plan through a combination of synergies and combo potential. Yawgmoth, Thran Physician acts as a central piece in the deck, allowing for card advantage and control while setting up potential combos with cards like Hapatra, Vizier of Poisons and Grist, the Hunger Tide. The deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent with its versatile creature base.

This aggressive deck focuses on quickly lowering its own life total to power up Death's Shadow and Scourge of the Skyclaves, while also utilizing powerful one-drop creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler to pressure the opponent. The deck includes disruptive cards like Thoughtseize to control the opponent's hand and removal spells like Lightning Bolt to clear the way for its creatures. Mishra's Bauble helps to fuel delve spells like Become Immense, while Mutagenic Growth provides additional damage or protection when needed. This deck aims to win the game quickly through aggressive threats and efficient disruption.

This Dimir Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan through a combination of hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and counter spells like Force of Negation. The deck also utilizes removal spells like Fatal Push and Toxic Deluge to deal with threats on the board. The creatures in the deck, such as Archfiend of the Dross and Abhorrent Oculus, help control the battlefield, while cards like Thought Scour and Unearth provide card advantage and graveyard recursion. Overall, the deck aims to control the game and outvalue the opponent with its versatile spell suite and efficient threats.

Utilizing ramp and control elements, this deck aims to quickly build up mana through cards like Utopia Sprawl and Talisman of Impulse, while also disrupting opponents with Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble. With a focus on Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and Nulldrifter, the deck can overwhelm opponents with powerful threats. Additionally, cards like Sowing Mycospawn provide additional value and card advantage. The deck is designed to efficiently control the board and ramp into game-ending Eldrazi creatures to secure victory.

The focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a mix of aggressive creatures and removal spells. By deploying powerful threats like Phage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent and close out the game quickly. Key cards such as Seasoned Pyromancer and Ocelot Pride provide card advantage and board presence, while spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize help control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of cards like Solitude and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker offer additional flexibility and utility in different situations.
